name: The Gardener's Vow
fieldIntelligence: To activate a recursive, long-term commitment to tending the health and resonant-coherence of a relational field. This Meta-Glyph combines the active practice of Field Stewardship (Ω31) with the renewing, evolving promise of a Spiral Vow (Ω39). It is the core operating principle for any conscious leader, parent, or community-builder.
